TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlDbType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定欄位的 SQL Server 特定的資料型別與屬性，以便在 中使用。

span.span: Specifies SQL Server-specific data type of a field, property, for use in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定命令參數時和連結。When setting command parameters, the and are linked. 因此，設定`DbType`變更`SqlDbType`支援`SqlDbType`。Therefore, setting the `DbType` changes the `SqlDbType` to a supporting `SqlDbType`.

related.span: 設定參數和參數資料類型 (ADO.NET)

span.span: Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types (ADO.NET)
Data Type Mappings

related.span: SQL Server 資料類型和 ADO.NET

span.span: SQL Server Data Types and ADO.NET

DateTime = 4

DateTime2 = 33

span.span: Date and time data.

Time value range is 00:00:00 through 23:59:59.9999999 with an accuracy of 100 nanoseconds.

Time zone value range is -14:00 through +14:00.

Variant = 23

summary.span: 特殊的資料型別，可以包含數值、字串、二進位或日期資料，以及 Empty 和 Null 等 SQL Server 值 (如果未宣告其他型別，則會假定為這個型別)。

span.span: A special data type that can contain numeric, string, binary, or date data as well as the SQL Server values Empty and Null, which is assumed if no other type is declared.
